description: Creates outbound requests for the specified campaign Amazon Connect account. This API is idempotent.

parameters.name: outboundRequests
parameters.description: A list of outbound requests. (dict) --- An outbound request for a campaign. Client provided parameter used for idempotency. Its value must be unique for each request. Timestamp with no UTC offset or timezone ChannelSubtypeParameters for an outbound request telephony (dict) --- Parameters for the Telephony Channel Subtype The phone number of the customer, in E.164 format. A custom key-value pair using an attribute map. The attributes are standard Amazon Connect attributes, and can be accessed in contact flows just like any other contact attributes. (string) --- The key of the attribute. Attribute keys can include only alphanumeric, dash, and underscore characters. (string) --- The value of the attribute. connectSourcePhoneNumber (string) --- The phone number associated with the Amazon Connect instance, in E.164 format. If you do not specify a source phone number, you must specify a queue. answerMachineDetectionConfig (dict) --- Answering Machine Detection config Enable or disable answering machine detection awaitAnswerMachinePrompt (boolean) --- Enable or disable await answer machine prompt sms (dict) --- Parameters for the SMS Channel Subtype The phone number of the customer, in E.164 format. connectSourcePhoneNumberArn (string) --- Amazon Resource Names(ARN) templateArn (string) --- Amazon Resource Names(ARN) A custom key-value pair using an attribute map. email (dict) --- Parameters for the Email Channel Subtype Source/Destination Email address used for Email messages connectSourceEmailAddress (string) --- Source/Destination Email address used for Email messages templateArn (string) --- Amazon Resource Names(ARN) A custom key-value pair using an attribute map. (string) --- The value of the attribute.

nested_params.name: clientToken
nested_params.description: Client provided parameter used for idempotency. Its value must be unique for each request.

nested_params.description: Timestamp with no UTC offset or timezone.
